comment.author: 31867746@N03
comment._content: This has to be, at the earliest, 1915 (not 1905), since Anchorage didn't exist until then.

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/aerogami] Thank you for your comment!  I'll be sure to pass this along to our colleagues at the Smithsonian's National Postal Museum. 

Sincerely, 

Susannah 
Smithsonian Institution Archives
